description: Episode of Series "Autopsy Dissection Technique". Shows the dissection and removal of the heart from the pericardial sac. Demonstrates in detail the opening of the various chambers, the dissection of the coronary arteries, and the examination of the various valves and their measurement. Concludes with the method of cutting and examining the myocardium.
